data: The other nations of Europe were yet immersed in barbarism, when Italy, where the light of civilization had never been wholly eclipsed, began to emerge from the darkness of the ruin of the Western Empire, and to catch from the East the returning rays of literature and science.

Valperga Volume 1 (of 3)
or, The life and adventures of Castruccio, prince of Lucca
